sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"惊吓，惊恐"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: alarm, frighten, startle, terrify, scare, intimidate
means: alarm ：着重指某人意识到危险而突然产生的惊恐。
frighten ：普通用词，使用广泛，指产生突然、短暂的惊慌、恐怖感。
startle ：强调突然使人惊骇或震惊。
terrify ：语气最强，指惊骇得六神无主，魂飞魄散。
scare ：指非正式文体中可与frighten换用，但语气较重，侧重人受惊吓后立即停下正在干的事或跑掉。
intimidate ：特指恐吓某人，迫使其做某事。

sentence.Network_en: "You have no right to intimidate this man," Alison continued.
sentence.Network_cn: “你没有权利威胁这个人，”艾莉森接着说。

sentence.Network_en: Jones had set out to intimidate and dominate Paul.
sentence.Network_cn: 琼斯开始恐吓并控制保罗。

sentence.Network_en: Don't you try to intimidate people by pinning labels on them.

one declared that a manager was someone who was " bossy , weak and insecure , who to intimidate people and does not contribute to the bottom line " .其中一位声称，管理者“专横跋扈、软弱无能、不可信任，他们总是企图威胁他人，又对企业利润没有贡献。”

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin intimidat- 'made timid', from the verb intimidare (based on timidus 'timid')

entry.def: If you intimidate someone, you deliberately make them frightened enough to do what you want them to do.

example.ex: Jones had set out to intimidate and dominate Paul...
example.tran: 琼斯开始恐吓并控制保罗。

example.ex: Attempts to intimidate people into voting for the governing party did not work.
example.tran: 胁迫人们为执政党投票的企图没有成功。

means.word_mean: 2. to compel or deter by or as if by threats

auth_sentence.content: Critics say the law is designed to intimidate Kremlin opponents.
auth_sentence.res_content: Critics say the law is designed to intimidate Kremlin opponents.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Critics say the law is designed to intimidate Kremlin opponents.

auth_sentence.content: They say arrests and jailings are being done to intimidate.
auth_sentence.res_content: They say arrests and jailings are being done to intimidate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They say arrests and jailings are being done to intimidate.

auth_sentence.content: I think this is an attempt to intimidate the lawful authorities.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think this is an attempt to intimidate the lawful authorities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think this is an attempt to intimidate the lawful authorities.

stems_affixes.word_buile: intimidate[v.胁迫,威胁[某人做某事]]+ion表名词→n.恐吓
timid[adj.胆怯的,怯懦的]+ity表名词→n.胆怯

sentences.en: The gang tried to intimidate the bank manager.
sentences.cn: 那帮歹徒企图恐吓银行经理。

sentences.en: He intimidates the children by shouting at them.
sentences.cn: 他朝孩子们大声叫喊以吓唬他们。

jushi.english: The gang tried to intimidate the merchant.
jushi.chinese: 犯罪团伙想恐吓这位商人。

jushi.english: The child was intimidated by the fury of the storm.
jushi.chinese: 这孩子被狂怒的风暴吓住了。

jushi.english: The robber tried to intimidate the bank manager.
jushi.chinese: 抢劫犯企图威吓银行经理。
